name: Crane Dreams
description:
Its a Crane game. The claw goes down and you never win. Eventually full physics will be implemented but right now you can grab a ball and drop it down the shoot. The joystick moves with the crane, as does the magic red button!!

THIS IS A DEV BUILD, MOST FEATURES DONT WORK.

What works: Moving the claw, dropping the claw, grabbing an object.

What doesnt work: Multiple games per play, physics (most of its canned right now)
